description:
Chika is MIA after rumors make the rounds that she was on the director`s casting couch. Yugure`s Knight bust into the class and begins to interrogate Chika on his live stream. When he almost reveals Yumiko`s identity as well, Chika`s anger explodes!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yuhi and Yasumi Can`t Keep It Hidden
Yuuhi to Yasumi wa Kakushi Kirenai
夕陽とやすみは隠しきれない
